title: Ancient Voices Volume 2
description: A collection of 12 original choral music tracks with an additional 3 variations, each with a beautiful and ancient tone. 15 cues in total, making over 40 minutes of original vocal music.
longDescription:
Preview: https://youtu.be/p-hRBAuNsuo

A collection of 12 original choral music tracks with an additional 3 variations, each with a beautiful and ancient tone. 15 cues in total, making over 40 minutes of original vocal music. This music sounds a bit like the soundtrack to Dark Souls or Lord of the Rings.

All tracks in this collection highlight choral voices, some also included some orchestral instruments as accompaniment, but always having the voice as the central role.

1. Calming Choir: 2:42
2. Cathedral Chapel (choir solo): 2:52
3. Cathedral Chapel: 2:52
4. Cathedral Inner Sanctum: 4:04
5. Choir of Despair (no piano): 2:16
6. Choir of Despair: 2:16
7. Cinematic Choir:2:04
8. Dark Choir: 2:13
9. Dark Church Choir: 2:40
10. Despair: 2:21
11. Leonin Cathedral: 2:58
12. Ominous Male Choir (choir solo): 3:02
13. Ominous Male Choir: 3:02
14. The Ancient Choir: 2:11
15. Voices of Notre Dame: 2:36
technicalDetails:
15 Tracks
15 cues
40 Minutes of Music
44.1/16 .WAV files
looping (Seamless)
Developed on Unreal Engine version 4.13
